entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to build project which depends on package containing pre-compressed static web assets #40413
  • [NETSDKE2E] Running dotnet test in the mstest project will generate a redundant file on Linux and Mac #40398

Closed

  • Cannot update/upgrade from https://packages.microsoft.com/ubuntu/22.04/prod #40400

PullRequests

Created

  • Copy Installer Pipeline ymls #40420
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • feat: Add support for updatedTypes in metadata updates #40416
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2437776 #40397
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Move Microsoft.DotNet.Tools.Tests.Utilities.Tests into Microsoft.DotNet.Cli.Utils.Tests #40417
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Preview 5 branding #40394
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Mark UseWindowsThreadPool as feature switch #40372
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [Wasm] Remove workarounds #39689
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #40364
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #40324
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • More workload set fixes #40266
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Aspire #40111
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Dotnet Cli Feature: `dotnet tool update --all` Updating all tools with one command #38996
    Area-Tools
  • Add repository policy to label and close stale issues #40226
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Installer to SDK merge - Phase 1 #38804
    untriaged
  • Ignore generic type parameter names when matching #40359
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Fix reporter encoding #40391
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #40369
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
